programme.title: Te Kāea
programme.desc: Presenters Piripi Taylor, Rahia Timutimu and the experienced team of reporters bring you the daily news, featuring local, national and international stories from a Māori perspective.

programme.title: Karanga The First Voice
programme.desc: A ground breaking series about the treasured art form of Karanga. We visit ten iwi around the motu to explore and celebrate Karanga in Contemporary Aotearoa. (R)

programme.title: Paepae
programme.desc: Young and old alike step up to the paepae to debate the latest issues with Chris Winitana and Tūpoutahi Winitana. (R)

programme.title: Waka Huia
programme.desc: Waka Huia is an iconic archival documentary series recording the unique stories and histories of Māori for all New Zealanders. (R)

programme.title: Taha Tauiwi
programme.desc: This series reconnects Māori whānau from around the country with their ‘other side’ or foreign ancestors. (R)
